casebody.data:
State
v.
Thomas Craig Campbell 252PA14-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2016 Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, Hannah H. Love, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Campbell, Thomas Craig. Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 11th of August 2016 by Defendant's:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of August 2016."

Defendant's shall have up to and including the 29th day of August 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
